title: ERROR
body: When I sig  it it is loading ...after a few minutes it shiws with red letter that 'Error,try it later' ..but not internet problem cz I have net....Please help me!

replies.body:
You may have net to other sites and services, but you could still be experiencing a routing issue to League specifically. Before we take an in-depth look at your route, I'd like to ensure all your local network settings are good. You can do this by working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), so I strongly recommend it as your next step.

Let me know if this caused any change.
